originalText.text: Michael was amazing to work with! He is so talented and produced absolutely stunning photos of our wedding day . I could not be happier with his work! He is friendly, easy to work with , and will make sure he captures every moment. I definitely recommend Michael G Photography! Some of the best work I’ve seen !

text.text: Michael was amazing to work with! He is so talented and produced absolutely stunning photos of our wedding day . I could not be happier with his work! He is friendly, easy to work with , and will make sure he captures every moment. I definitely recommend Michael G Photography! Some of the best work I’ve seen !

originalText.text: I highly recommend Michael and his photography and videography services for any event. From our first initial meeting to the timeline creation to our engagement photoshoot and all the way to our wedding day, Michael has been amazing to work with. He offers his advice and helps you plan out everything in detail. His amazing work (both photo and video) speaks for itself. He pays close attention to detail and has passion for capturing all the special moments. Michael has been nothing but professional, patient, and easy to work with throughout the whole process. On our wedding day we were running late to the site for our Wedding photoshoot. Not only did Michael and his team keep us relaxed that whole time, but they made the whole day a stress free experience. Thank you Michael for capturing our special moments.

originalText.text: I cannot recommend Michael and his team enough!! My Wife and I met with Michael last spring to do an engagement photo shoot in Central Park. We were blown away by the pictures!!! Fast forward at our wedding and the pictures were only better!! Michael is hands down the best in NYC!! Also - if you are debating doing a wedding video, DO IT!! The video was incredible! It incorporated our wedding song and the shots were incredible!! The best part about working with Michael is that he sent us sneak peaks days after the wedding and we got our full album within weeks!!

originalText.text: michael and his team  are true professionals. The photos that he takes are incredible and he is so great with kids and families! We loved our maternity photos, newborn pictures, and family sessions. The care and consideration put in to every aspect of this business is outstanding.

originalText.text: The best photographer in NY! You can order both his services and services from Michaels Studio. He'll help you to choose the package taking into account your needs and budget. The quality of photos are stunning! All of them look perfect! The best editing I saw comparing with other photographers in the US. And when the whole team works (both photographers and filmmakers), you can be assured in the fantastic result!
